mapper.select: SELECT car.car_id AS id, car.car_name AS name, car.car_num_seats AS numSeats, car.car_active AS active, car.car_created_at AS creationDate, car.car_updated_at AS modificationDate, p.ply_id AS driverId, p.ply_first_name AS driverFirstName FROM t_car car JOIN t_player p on car.car_driver_id = p.ply_id WHERE car.car_id = #{id}

UPDATE t_car SET car_active = false, car_updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE car_id = #{car.id}
mapper.select: SELECT car_id AS id, car_name AS name, car_num_seats AS numSeats, FROM t_car WHERE car_driver_id = #{player.id} AND car_active = true

SELECT c.car_id AS id, c.car_name AS name, c.car_num_seats AS numSeats, COUNT(pm.pma_player_id) - 1 AS numPassengers, -- The driver is excluded from the passenger count d.ply_id AS driverId, d.ply_email AS driverEmail, d.ply_first_name AS driverFirstName FROM t_car c JOIN t_player_match pm on c.car_id = pm.pma_car_id JOIN t_player d on c.car_driver_id = d.ply_id WHERE pm.pma_match_id = #{match.id} AND c.car_active = true GROUP BY c.car_id, d.ply_id
SELECT coalesce( (SELECT true FROM t_player_match r JOIN t_match m ON m.mat_id = r.pma_match_id WHERE r.pma_car_id = #{car.id} AND m.mat_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND mat_status = 'CREATED'), false);
